statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_conditions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM traffic_conditions WHERE weather_conditions = 'Rainy';
SELECT * FROM traffic_conditions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT location, traffic_intensity FROM traffic_conditions ORDER BY traffic_intensity DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_conditions WHERE location = 'New York' AND weather_conditions = 'Sunny';
SELECT * FROM traffic_conditions WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location, weather_conditions FROM traffic_conditions WHERE traffic_intensity > 5 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, location FROM traffic_conditions WHERE weather_conditions = 'Rainy' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_conditions WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-02-01' ORDER BY traffic_intensity DESC;
SELECT location, traffic_intensity FROM traffic_conditions WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY traffic_intensity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Data WHERE location = 'Highway A'
SELECT id, speed FROM Traffic_Data WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM Route_Planning WHERE origin_location = 'City X' AND destination_location = 'City Y'
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Data WHERE speed BETWEEN 30 AND 60 AND location LIKE 'Highway%'
SELECT location, speed FROM Traffic_Data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, location, speed FROM Traffic_Data WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY speed DESC;
SELECT route_id, route_name, origin_location, destination_location FROM Route_Planning WHERE origin_location = 'City A' OR destination_location = 'City B';
SELECT id, location, speed, timestamp FROM Traffic_Data WHERE location LIKE '%Highway%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Traffic_Data WHERE speed BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM TrafficConditions;
SELECT road_name, timestamp, traffic_intensity FROM TrafficConditions WHERE weather_condition = 'Rainy';
SELECT end_location, distance FROM Routes ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE preferred_route_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username, email, route_id, start_location, end_location FROM Users JOIN Routes ON preferred_route_id = route_id;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE preferred_route_id = 3
SELECT road_name, traffic_intensity, weather_condition FROM TrafficConditions WHERE traffic_intensity > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT start_location, end_location, distance FROM Routes WHERE distance BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY route_id
SELECT user_id, username, email, route_id, start_location, end_location FROM Users JOIN Routes ON Users.preferred_route_id = Routes.route_id
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras;
SELECT location, status FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status='active';
SELECT id, location, last_updated FROM traffic_cameras ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_reports WHERE congestion_level > 5;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM traffic_routes WHERE estimated_time_minutes < 30;
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras;
SELECT location, status, last_updated FROM traffic_cameras ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_reports WHERE congestion_level > 3;
SELECT report_id, camera_id, road_condition FROM traffic_reports WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM traffic_users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM traffic_conditions;
SELECT id, location, congestion_level FROM traffic_conditions WHERE congestion_level > 3;
SELECT location, weather_conditions FROM traffic_conditions WHERE congestion_level < 2;
SELECT id, start_location, end_location, distance FROM route_planning ORDER BY distance DESC;
SELECT * FROM navigation WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_conditions WHERE congestion_level > 3 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT id, location, weather_conditions FROM traffic_conditions WHERE congestion_level = 1
SELECT * FROM route_planning WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC
SELECT location, incident_type FROM incidents WHERE location LIKE 'City%' AND incident_type = 'Accident'
SELECT navigation.id, route_id, coordinates, eta FROM navigation INNER JOIN route_planning ON navigation.route_id = route_planning.id
